Text: Re Carol St ClairThe sick leave policy is weeks at and weeks at So some of that time will fall into the pay Take care Carol St Clair ECT PM Sent by Suzanne CT To Michele NRON cc Subject Re Carol St Clair Michele is this weeks of sick pay at full pay Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax Michele NRON AM To Carol St CT cc Subject Re Carol St Clair Good Morning She will get weeks of sick pay Please be sure that her time is coded as sick starting today Thanks Carol St Clair ECT AM Sent by Suzanne CT To Michele NRON cc Subject Re Carol St Clair Michele Carol had her baby last night and had to have a csection Does this add time to her maternity leave What about the other weeks that we are given for illness She cant use them Suzanne Carols assistant Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax Michele NRON AM To Mark CT cc Carol St CT Subject Re Carol St Clair Hi Mark Please forward this information to the timekeeper in order that her time off will be coded correctly An alternative would be for Carol to complete her timesheets before she leaves With SAP this can be done in advance Let me know if you have any questions Thanks From Mark CT on PM To Michele NRON cc Carol St CT Subject Carol St Clair Michele Just to let you know that I have approved the following for Carol In addition to the weeks that Enron allows for leave Carol will add to that period by using any remaining vacation time that she has for I believe an additional days After that time is used up Carol will be on an unpaid leave of absence until December Please let me know if there is anything else you need Mark
